author: ruwan
msg: Fixing an issue with declared namespaces in the XPATH, if we take allDeclaredNamespaces then the default namespace is also going to be injected to the XPATH resulting the xpath variables to be qualified by the default namespace. We must not consider the default namespace because attributes from default are unqualified if not specified.
